Jeff Brown <Jeff@ingenio.com>, from devel-list, notes:
The Castle.Core.Logging.LoggerLevel enum as currently defined has the following ordering of severities:
Off > Fatal > Error > Info > Warn > Debug
Notice that Info is considered to have greater severity than Warn. I think this is backwards to common usage...
Any reason it should be this way? Can we flip those two around?
Also, since the enum values are order dependent, we should probably explicitly assign them so someone doesn't just up and alphabetize them.
